data.name: Bhai Kultar Singh
data.content: This is such a great way of getting our music out to the masses
data.position: Son of Bhai Avtar Singh Ji, 14th Generation of Rababi Tradition

data.name: Dr Gurnam Singh
data.content: We now have some rigour and discipline in teaching music
data.position: Professor of Music, Punjabi University, Patiala

data.name: Bhai Satnider Singh Bodal
data.content: Anything to support the teaching of the next generation of Kirtanis is a good thing
